The first settlement in Laos after crossing the Thai-Lao border at Nam Hueng.
There are two bus stations in town. Heading south: Vientiane 90,000 kip; Nam Hueng 35,000 kip. Heading north: Sayabouly and Luang Prabang
Explore the town by foot or take tuk-tuk from the bus stations to centre.
A small market is located in the centre next to the football playground. BCEL Bank has an ATM and accepts international cards.

value: content=Good Thai-Lao food. Friendly owner/chef with 15 years cooking experience in Bangkok.

Places on the Mekong River with overlooking views.

value: directions=Main road next to the monument
content=Clean, new rooms with air and fan options.
